column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔhen bi bedzi hen wɔ tsenenee mu
column4: na mbapɔmba edzi tum wɔ atsɛmbu mu."

column2: "Na hɔn mu biara bɛyɛ dɛ huntsabea wɔ mframa ano
column3: na guandɔbea wɔ ehum ano; dɛ asaase kwawee do esuesu
column4: dɛ ɔbotan kɛse ase nwinwin wɔ asaase a oetwie do."

column2: "Na hɔn a wohu adze enyi nnkɛyɛ kusukusu
column3: na hɔn a wɔtse asɛm aso bɛkyɛn."

column2: "Na horopohoropofo akoma bɛtse nyimdzee ase
column3: na adodopofo gyirama bɛkasa a no mu tsew."

column2: "Wɔnnkɛfrɛ ogyangyantwi no onyimnyamfo bio
column3: na otsiɔdzenfo wɔnnkɛse no dɛ ɔyɛ ɔdɔyɛfo."

column2: "Na ogyangyantwi bɛka egyangyantwisɛm
column6: na ɔama nyia ɔkɔm dze no ne kra atɔ pan
column7: na ɔama anondze abɔ nyia nsukɔm dze no no."

column2: "Na otsiafo edwindadze so muo: ɔhyehyɛ ne tsirmu nhyehyɛɛ bɔn dɛ ɔdze atorsɛm bɛsɛɛ ɔbɔbɔnyi
column3: mpo ber a ohianyi kasa tsenenee no."

column2: "Ɔyamuyiefo dze
column3: ɔhyehyɛ ne tsirmu ayamuyiedze; na ayamuyiedze mu na obegyina."

column2: "Hom nsoɛr
column3: hom mbaa a hom ho adwe hom
column4: na hom ntsie me ndze; hom mbabaa a hom twer homho

column2: "Afrenhyia ekyir nda bi mu na wɔbɔfona hom
column3: hom mbaa a hom twer homho: na wenyin abatsew bɛsa
column4: na n'anoboa no so remmba bio."

column2: "Hom ho mpopo
column3: hom mbaa a hom ho adwe hom; hom a hom twer homho
column4: hom ho ntsitsi hom: hom nyiyi hom ho efuradze
column6: na hom mfa eyitam mbobɔ hom asen."

column2: "Hom mpempem hom akoko wɔ mfuwa fɛɛfɛw no ntsi
column3: wɔ wenyindua a ɔsow wosowoso no ntsi."

column2: "Nsoɛ na nkɔkrɔw befifir me man asaase no do; nyew
column3: wɔ enyigye kurow no mu enyigye adan nyinara do mpo:"

column2: "na wɔbɛdan ahemfi no egya; kurow a nyimpa bitsibitsi wɔ mu no bɛda pan; koko no na aweɔmfo aban no bɛdan etu ara daa
column3: na ɔbɛyɛ sar do nsoasopɔnkɔ enyigyebea

column2: "dze ekesi dɛ wobefi sor ehue sunsum no egu hɛn do
column3: ma sar no adan asaaseber a ɔma ndɔbaa
column4: na woebu asaaseber a ɔma ndɔbaa no dɛ kwaa."

column2: "Ɔno na atsɛmbu bɛtsena sar do
column3: na ndzeyɛtsenenee atsena nsaaseber a ɔma ndɔbaa mu."

column2: "Na ndzeyɛtsenenee bɔsow asomdwee aba; na ndzeyɛtsenenee no nsunsuando ayɛ kommyɛ na awerɛhyɛmu daa."
"Na me man bɛtsena asomdwee tsenabea
"Na ɔsorbo bogu wɔ kwaa n'asehwe mu; na wɔbɛbrɛ kurow no adze koraa."
"Esiarfo nye hom a hom pe aba wɔ esu nyina ho
column3: na hom to ɔnantwi na asoaso anan kwan."
